name: Sukhiba
description:
SUKHIBA harnesses WhatsApp Business APIs to empower eCommerce merchants in boosting sales, streamlining marketing, optimizing operations, and enhancing customer retention. By integrating commerce and CRM solutions, SUKHIBA enables large enterprises to efficiently engage with their retailers. It also helps eCommerce businesses build their own commerce websites directly within WhatsApp, creating a seamless connection with retailers.

Through SUKHIBA FLOWS, we are shaping the future of communication by enabling businesses to center all their workflows around meaningful conversations. From marketing and sales to support teams, SUKHIBA FLOWS streamlines operations using cutting-edge conversational AI. By automating routine tasks, enhancing customer interactions, and delivering exceptional support, this customer-first solution empowers businesses to achieve unmatched scalability and growth.
focus_areas: WhatsApp Engagement Platform: Specializing in broadcasting automation, and chatbots for enhanced customer engagement and support.
